overview: Marino, 18, a young foreign film student, meets Esmeralda, 20, a student and a painter, in whom he finds the muse he always wanted for his cameras. Naively, he discovers little by little that Esmeralda is much more than just that… and soon he sees himself wanting to be what she is to him: her muse.
tagline: A girl. 9 cameras. 4 film gauges. A naive boy in love discovering cinema… and a thing or two about real life, real artists and real women.
title: Marino and Esmeralda
